passive.description:
Using a weapon skill grants [Spear Scar]: The next 4 Basic Attacks gain +60% Attack Speed, +2.5m range, and +30%
Lifesteal. This effect lasts 6s.
Also has a 35% chance to grant  
[Target-based Max HP
15%] Shield for 2s.

basicAttacks.description:

[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage to the target. 
Can cast [Leap Strike] every 5s.
Charges toward the enemy target, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 170%] Physical Damage and increasing Attack Speed by
20% for 4s
Performs a piercing spear throw toward the target after 5 Basic Attacks. Deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to enemies along the path and increases Movement Speed by 20% for 2 seconds.s

[Basic Attack]:Deals 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage to the target.

Deals

commonSkills.description:
Repeatedly thrusts at enemies in a frontal cone, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage per hit, then
slashes forward to deal 
[Damage Rate: 130%] Physical
Damage to enemies in range.

Throws a lance at the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage and reducing Movement
Speed by 25% for 3s to enemies in range.
The lance remains at the target location for 6s. Moving to
its location allows retrieval, granting 20% Movement
Speed and 20% Attack Speed for 4s.
Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 2 charges

Channels for 4s, gaining immunity to control effects and increasing Damage Resistance by 60%. Any damage taken during this period is reflected back at the attacker as 80% Physical Damage. Deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage to surrounding enemy targets every 0.5s. Can re-cast a skill while channeling to dash forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in the path and inflicting 20% Armor Reduction for 4s.

Deals 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies
in front and inflicts Knockup for 1s.
Can be recast within 6s to slam down, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and
reducing their Movement Speed by 45% for 3s

Instantly removes Control effects, deals 
[Damage Rate: 280%] Physical Damage to enemies in front, and leaps
back 8m. Increases Movement Speed by 30% for 4s.
Can be used while skills are disabled

skills.description: Swings forward repeatedly, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] (to players) / [Damage Rate: 240%] (to monsters) Physical Damage to enemies in range, and finally deals [Damage Rate: 180%] (to players) / [Damage Rate: 360%] (to monsters) Physical Damage to enemies in range. Each attack also applies Armor Reduction of 7, lasting 6s, stacking up to 4 times.

Leaps to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 300%]
Physical Damage and Immobilizing enemies for 2.5s on
landing. Plants a Banner of Justice that lasts 8s. Allies
within its range gain 30% Damage Resistance and 35%
Attack Speed.

Charges at the target enemy, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Stun for 1s
(ignores Control Resistance). Throws the target
backward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical
Damage to enemies in the landing area and reducing their
Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.

Performs a sweeping strike, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 300%]
Physical Damage and knocking enemies back 8m.
Increases the caster's Damage Resistance by 50% for 6s.
Creates a disruption field lasting 8s that Slows enemies
within 8m by 30% and reduces their damage by 20%.

Charges forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 67%] Physical Damage to enemies in the path. Upon reaching the destination, performs 3 strikes on enemy targets in front, each dealing [Damage Rate: 67%] Physical Damage. Each strike that hits at least one enemy target restores [Healing Rate: 67%] of its own Vitality. Can be cast again within 6s.

Throws a corroding lance at the target location, dealing
Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies hit
and reducing their Max HP by 15% for 4s. Creates an
expanding corrosive field lasting 5s that reduces
Movement Speed by 40% and deals 
[Damage Rate: 80%]
Magic Damage every second to enemies within.
Gains 1 charge every 25s, up to 2 charges

Dashes in the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 260%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup on for 1s.
Inflicts Disarm and reduces Movement Speed by 30% for 4s
Gains 1 charge every 18s, up to 2 charges
